title: [Large-Scale] Client-Centered Instructional Workshop for Mental Health Psychoeducational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mental Health Concepts and Foundational Educational Psychology Knowledge
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program for pre-service teachers in a mobile-based microlearning environment. Focuses on developing psycho-pedagogical design competencies applicable to real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Construct a mental health psychoeducation design framework by applying client-centered instructional methods.
Select appropriate instructional strategies by analyzing learner engagement levels, environmental conditions, and content requirements.
Apply four major instructional approaches (behavioral, acquisitional, cognitive, constructivist) to real educational scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
